speaker: RICHIE SZALAY
line: Bogey at 12 o'clock. Whoo! Gotcha.

speaker: RICHIE SZALAY
line: I have engagement of unidentified flying object on Fanning Ranch Road westbound moving like a bat out of hell.

speaker: RICHIE SZALAY
line: 90-degree, low altitude, max-g redirect. Absolutely impossible.

speaker: RICHIE SZALAY
line: Oh, you idiot.

speaker: RICHIE SZALAY
line: Oh, this is not happening.

speaker: RICHIE SZALAY
line: This is not happening! Shoot!

speaker: RICHIE SZALAY
line: Hey! Hey!

speaker: RICHIE SZALAY
line: I come in peace.

speaker: RICHIE SZALAY
line: This is not happening.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Hi.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Hi.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You said on the phone you'd received something urgent.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: You're right, I did. And I think it's really important you got right down here, Agent Scully. Thanks.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You going to tell me what it is?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: I passed it on to A.D. Skinner. I'd like for him to tell you.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Here they are.

speaker: SKINNER'S ASSISTANT
line: Do you need me to ask Agent Scully about her travel plans?

speaker: SKINNER
line: No. She'll be flying with us.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What? What is it?

speaker: SKINNER
line: Let's go into my office.

speaker: SCULLY
line: All right, what's going on here?

speaker: SKINNER
line: A report came in last night from Montana. About a UFO encounter.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What kind of encounter?

speaker: SKINNER
line: A young man chased a bright object flying low across the sky. Tracked it all the way to a big field where the UFO disappeared … but where he claimed he saw an alien.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Assistant Director, I've got drawers full of reports that begin just like that. Are you going to tell me what's so important about this case?

speaker: SKINNER
line: Young man's named Richie Szalay. UFO nut from Bellefleur, Oregon. You and Agent Mulder met him out there last spring.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Are you trying to tell me this has something to do with Mulder?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: He's trying to tell you that it might.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Richie Szalay didn't find an alien last night. He found a woman. A woman whose name you will remember-- Teresa Hoese.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Teresa Hoese was the young mother who was abducted the night before Agent Mulder was.

speaker: SKINNER
line: And who was returned last night.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Returned?

speaker: SKINNER
line: Hanging onto life by a thread.

speaker: DR. DESAI
line: Who, who is Mr. Skinner?

speaker: SKINNER
line: I'm Skinner. You Dr. Desai?

speaker: DR. DESAI
line: I was just told you were on your way. That you flew out here all the way here from Washington, DC.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Yeah, we're here to see Teresa Hoese.

speaker: DR. DESAI
line: I know. I just wish someone would tell me these things because this woman is in no condition...

speaker: SCULLY
line: What is her condition?

speaker: DR. DESAI
line: She's circling the drain. 12 years, I have never seen anything near this level of mistreatment.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Doctor, it's important we see the victim and talk to her if we can about what happened.

speaker: DR. DESAI
line: Just promise me, whoever did this, you guys will do everything in your power to catch them.

speaker: DR. DESAI
line: By rights, this young woman shouldn't even be alive.

speaker: DR. DESAI
line: The medics said she asked for her baby last night but she hasn't said a word otherwise. I suspect it's all she's holding on to. What's upsetting is... it's almost like someone was experimenting on her.

speaker: SKINNER
line: What exactly did they do to her?

speaker: DR. DESAI
line: Inside her cheeks there's tissue damage in a linear pattern. Her chest was cut into and organ tissue in her abdomen's scooped away. In the x-rays I see damage to the soft palate.

speaker: SCULLY
line: In the x-rays, did you see, um... anything else? Foreign objects.

speaker: DR. DESAI
line: I'm not sure what you mean.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Little pieces of metal. Implants.

speaker: DR. DESAI
line: No, I didn't.

speaker: UNIFORMED COP
line: There was an Agent Doggett requesting a police report.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: You're welcome to stay here and discuss foreign objects but... looks like we got a suspect.

speaker: TV DOCUMENTARY
line: U.S. pilots patrolling German airspace...

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Richie Szalay?

speaker: RICHIE SZALAY
line: Yeah?

speaker: TV DOCUMENTARY
line: ...Describing highly manoeuvrable balls of light, which they referred to as "foo fighters..."

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Richie?

speaker: RICHIE SZALAY
line: Yeah.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: John Doggett. I'm an FBI Agent. This is Agent Scully, Assistant Director Skinner, our boss. You mind if we come in?

speaker: RICHIE SZALAY
line: Dude, you're, you're already in.

speaker: RICHIE SZALAY
line: But, I, I know you. Do I know you?

speaker: SCULLY
line: You do... Richie. From Oregon. We met late last spring, you remember?

speaker: SKINNER
line: Richie, if you live in Oregon... what are you doing in Montana?

speaker: RICHIE SZALAY
line: My buddy, Gary, right? He was abducted. Right before your partner. I, I came looking for him.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: So, you just came out here on a lark?

speaker: RICHIE SZALAY
line: No. I was following the news.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: The news?

speaker: RICHIE SZALAY
line: All, all that's in the last two weeks. Yeah, I go on these Internet chat rooms to talk about sightings and junk. After Oregon there wasn't a whole lot but then all of a sudden in Montana... I, I never... I, I never thought I'd find Mrs. Hoese like that. Not in a million years.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Richie, when you found that woman's body you said you saw somebody with her. You told the police it was an alien. You know what a moulage casting is, Richie?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: It's what the cops take when they find shoe prints. They do these plaster castings and the ones they got from the field that night were from 9½ Nikes. You ever hear of an alien in Nikes?

speaker: RICHIE SZALAY
line: Doesn't mean it wasn't.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Did it ever occur to you that it wasn't an alien but a man?

speaker: RICHIE SZALAY
line: Then what about his spaceship?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Agent Doggett? What was that in there?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: That was pressing a witness to get to the truth.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You refuse to believe that anything other than a man could have done this. Could have done what we saw to that woman in the hospital.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: It's not worth arguing about. The point here is to find Mulder.

speaker: SCULLY
line: And for months, we have been looking for a break, which is what we've got here.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: What we've got is hope. But let's be honest, Agent Scully, about what no one wants to say.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Bad as you want to find Mulder, you're afraid to find him, too.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What if he's dead?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'm sorry. I just had a bad dream.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Let me get some clothes on.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I once had a talk with Mulder about starlight. How it's billions of years old.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Stars that are now long dead whose light is still traveling through time. It won't die, that light.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Maybe that's the only thing that never does. He said that's where souls reside. I hope he's right.

speaker: SKINNER
line: If you're trying to prepare yourself I want you to stop. Nothing says that we're going to stumble over him in some field. Nothing says he won't be fine.

speaker: NIGHT NURSE
line: May I help you, sir?

speaker: DR. DESAI
line: Yes, I want to have a patient transferred. Teresa Hoese.

speaker: NIGHT NURSE
line: To be transferred?

speaker: DR. DESAI
line: To another facility. I'd like to get her ready as soon as we can.

speaker: NIGHT NURSE
line: Okay.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yeah? … Hold on. … Who took her? … Well, has anybody talked to the doctor and asked him why? Or where? … Well, where's Agent Doggett now?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Did you find her?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: No.

speaker: SCULLY
line: No? I don't understand. You called us all the way out here.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: To get another point of view.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Another point of view? We have a patient missing, Agent Doggett.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: You should just hear her out.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Hear who out?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Her name's Monica Reyes. I worked a case with her once.

speaker: SKINNER
line: She's FBI?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Yeah. She's got some expertise I thought we might take advantage of.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Expertise in what?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: She's got her master's in religious studies. Her specialization is ritualistic crime.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Ritualistic crime? Are we working the same case here?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Agent Reyes.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Assistant Director Skinner, Agent Scully... Monica Reyes.

speaker: REYES
line: Hi.

speaker: REYES
line: Beautiful country out here.

speaker: REYES
line: I know it's not very FBI of me, but I'm really trying to quit.

speaker: REYES
line: So, Agent Doggett's been taking me through the case. Interesting.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Interesting?

speaker: REYES
line: What do you think happened?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Isn't that what you're here to tell us?

speaker: REYES
line: Oh, I have my own thoughts. It's just, what we think happened and what actually happened aren't always the same thing but not altogether insignificant, either.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'm sorry, this feels like therapy.

speaker: REYES
line: What happened being different from what we want to have happened.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What "who" wants to have happened?

speaker: REYES
line: Well, I'm told this case involves you.

speaker: SCULLY
line: It may involve someone close to me. Can we stick to the facts, please?

speaker: REYES
line: Well, it's pretty clear that the woman who was found out here did not inflict her own injuries. That she was dropped here by someone and whoever it was cared about her enough not to kill her.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Did you happen to know the peculiar nature of her injuries?

speaker: REYES
line: Yes. They were peculiar, but not altogether different from your typical cult ritualistic abuse.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Agent Reyes, we're dealing with abductions here... not by any cult.

speaker: REYES
line: Okay. Good. I mean, if it's not.

speaker: SCULLY
line: But you think that it is.

speaker: REYES
line: Well, I go on what I know, of course but I try to stay, you know, open.

speaker: SCULLY
line: So, what do you think happened?

speaker: REYES
line: Well, I'm told that Agent Mulder and the other people who were taken were true believers. People 100% convinced in the abduction phenomenon.

speaker: SKINNER
line: If this is about these people staging their own abductions...

speaker: REYES
line: No, it's about people coming together. Like minds as a group.

speaker: SCULLY
line: So you're basically saying that Agent Mulder has joined some sort of UFO cult.

speaker: REYES
line: Call it a group.

speaker: SKINNER
line: For what?

speaker: REYES
line: Well, we've all heard the news stories about transport to a mothership, the idea of a giant motherwheel. The whole Heaven's Gate thing.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I see.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: It'd make sense. The leader of the cult leaves this woman out here to die. Learning she's still alive he comes back to kidnap her again for fear of exposure. It'd make sense, too that if we find this guy, maybe we find Mulder.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Are you asking me to believe this?

speaker: REYES
line: No. That's not what I said. I don't think he left her to die. I don't think she's dead.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Based on what?

speaker: REYES
line: Nothing, really. It's just a feeling.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: What are you walking away for? It makes some kind of sense.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'm glad you agree with her, Agent Doggett, because I'm not even sure that she agrees with you. Nor has she made any sense for me of how the doctor who removed Teresa Hoese from the hospital last night seems, by all accounts to have been in two places at once.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: I know where you're going with this, Agent Scully but if you're going to tell me this is another alien bounty hunter this is where we part company.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Enjoy your new company.

speaker: ABSALOM
line: How is she?

speaker: JEREMIAH SMITH
line: We were almost too late.

speaker: REYES
line: Oh, hi.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I thought you'd be out combing the hills with Agent Doggett.

speaker: REYES
line: I'm on my way out to see him. I just wanted to see film on this woman's injuries-- Teresa Hoese.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Is there something you're looking for, Agent Reyes in particular?

speaker: REYES
line: Implants, or signs of them.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Implants? I don't understand.

speaker: REYES
line: Metallic implants. Placed in the body, oftentimes in the nasal cavity. Sometimes made of bone or cartilage making detection a little more difficult.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yeah, I'm well aware of how they work.

speaker: REYES
line: You said you didn't understand.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I don't understand your interest in what is commonly considered evidence of alien abduction as a disbeliever in that phenomena.

speaker: REYES
line: I'm not a disbeliever.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Excuse me. I, I, uh, I'm very confused. I know what I heard and I heard you say that what we're dealing with here is nothing more than a UFO cult.

speaker: REYES
line: There's the confusion. I still believe that but it doesn't mean I don't believe in the phenomena.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You believe in extraterrestrials?

speaker: REYES
line: Let's just say I don't not believe. As I said, I try to stay open.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What is it you specialize in again? Ritualistic crime?

speaker: REYES
line: Right. Satanic ritual abuse. Or, I should say claims of it. We never found any hard evidence.

speaker: SCULLY
line: We should talk sometime.

speaker: REYES
line: Not that I don't believe in it. I was something of a black sheep in the field office in New Orleans … because of my beliefs.

speaker: SCULLY
line: And what beliefs are those?

speaker: REYES
line: I just have certain spiritual notions. I believe there are energies in the universe. It might sound kind of cosmic but I think I'm sensitive to them. I mean, I get these feelings.

speaker: SCULLY
line: And do you have any feelings about Agent Mulder?

speaker: REYES
line: I don't know Agent Mulder. And I don't have any feelings about him. But I am feeling your fear. And fear's not going to help you find him or anyone else. Maybe you can try and stay open, too.

speaker: REYES
line: No frickin' way.

speaker: ABSALOM
line: One, two, three, up.

speaker: REYES
line: Stop there! I'm a Federal Agent!

speaker: SCULLY
line: Examination of victim, Gary Edward Cory, reveals cuts and abrasions from ligature or binding devices accompanied by distal and proximal bruising radiating in a symmetrical pattern around the ankles, the wrists... and the face.

speaker: RICHIE SZALAY
line: Oh, my god, Gary.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You can go now, Richie. They just need you to sign a form.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Dana...

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'm okay. There's work to do here.

speaker: REYES
line: You're hurting for her, I know.

speaker: REYES
line: Agent Scully.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: I don't know how she's doing it in there. With everything she's feeling. What she's afraid of.

speaker: REYES
line: You know all too well.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Let's leave the past in the past.

speaker: REYES
line: It was your fear, too. Those three days we looked for your son. The fear of finding what we did.

speaker: REYES
line: I understand. That's why you're so determined to find Mulder alive.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: It's why I can't stand here and listen to all this mumbo jumbo about spaceships.

speaker: REYES
line: I saw what I saw, John. I'm not going to lie to you. But whatever it was, it led to this. It's the man I saw in the field.

speaker: REYES
line: He goes by the name Absalom. A religious zealot who escaped a shoot-out in Idaho. Where he was the nominal leader of a doomsday cult who believed aliens would take over the world at the millennium. Disgraced when they didn't, he fled and tried a registered to a farm about an hour from here.

speaker: JEREMIAH SMITH
line: Get everyone inside.

speaker: ABSALOM
line: What? What is it?

speaker: JEREMIAH SMITH
line: They're coming.

speaker: ABSALOM
line: Who? Who's coming?

speaker: JEREMIAH SMITH
line: You can't let them find him.

speaker: MALE VOICE
line: Federal Agents! Nobody move!

speaker: MALE VOICE
line: Hands on your heads!

speaker: DOGGETT
line: FBI! Please remain calm! We have a warrant to search the premises. You are surrounded by law officers who are armed, and prepared to shoot, if necessary.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Stop there! Hands on your head. Turn around so I can see you.

speaker: MALE VOICES
line: Move! Move! Go on! Move! Move! On the ground now! FBI! Don't move!

speaker: REYES
line: Please don't panic. You are in no danger if you stay calm and where we can see you.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Teresa.

speaker: REYES
line: Agent Scully...

speaker: SCULLY
line: You better get AD Skinner in to see this. And Agent Doggett.

speaker: ABSALOM
line: I said I can't explain why it happens. Or how. Only where.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: I got 46... of your followers rounded up out there at your compound. You make me go to them for a straight answer it's only going to make it worse for you.

speaker: ABSALOM
line: How many times can I tell you?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Night's early. Coffee's hot.

speaker: ABSALOM
line: The ships come in, drop the abductees all messed up. I go and get them so I can help them.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Just like you helped Teresa Hoese when you left her for dead?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Agent Doggett.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You, uh... you say that these abductees are returned with severe injuries. But that doesn't fit the pattern of any alien abduction model.

speaker: ABSALOM
line: That's what I'm trying to explain. I predicted there would be an alien invasion at the Millennium. I was right, it turns out. 'Cause that's when this all started.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Sir... given the criminal charges against you, you couldn't be a less credible witness so stop trying to validate your theories and just give us the truth.

speaker: ABSALOM
line: I'm telling you the truth. I only want to help these people.

speaker: SCULLY
line: So these video cameras that you have around your compound-- how do they help?

speaker: ABSALOM
line: Abductees... live in fear of being taken again. The cameras give them a sense of security.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Or makes them afraid to leave.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Do you have videotape of how you happened to heal Teresa Hoese?

speaker: ABSALOM
line: No.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I asked you to give me the truth.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Do you have videotape of this man?

speaker: SKINNER
line: He's hiding something.

speaker: REYES
line: Yeah, that's for sure.

speaker: REYES
line: Agent Scully?

speaker: REYES
line: What?

speaker: REYES
line: What is it?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I saw him.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I saw something.

speaker: REYES
line: I reviewed these tapes from the compound. There are some things here I want you all to see.

speaker: SKINNER
line: They've got a body in there.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Who is it?

speaker: REYES
line: You can't tell from this angle.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well, then where's another angle?

speaker: REYES
line: This is the only angle I could find.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Wait a minute. Stop it.

speaker: SCULLY
line: That man. I know that man.

speaker: REYES
line: Good, because here he is again.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Who is he?

speaker: SCULLY
line: His name is Jeremiah Smith. Agent Mulder knew him. He believed that he had the ability to heal people.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: What do you mean, "heal people"?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Like he did Teresa Hoese.

speaker: REYES
line: Well, whoever he is take a look at this.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: What the hell just happened?

speaker: REYES
line: That's what I'd like to know.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Wow. That's still Jeremiah Smith.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: The hell it was. That's me, and I never even went in that building.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Exactly. We have to get back out there.

speaker: GUARD
line: Halt. Identify yourself.

speaker: SCULLY
line: We're looking for someone. A man who may be one of the detainees.

speaker: SKINNER
line: We need some bodies out here to help search the woods.

speaker: SCULLY
line: FBI. Where is he? Jeremiah Smith.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Look, I know he's here. Jeremiah Smith. I need to speak with him.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You-- in the back. Step out.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Come with me.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Take a seat.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Are you Jeremiah Smith?

speaker: YOUNG MAN
line: No, I...

speaker: SCULLY
line: Did you heal these people?

speaker: YOUNG MAN
line: No.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Did you heal Teresa Hoese?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Look, I know who you are.

speaker: REYES
line: Agent Scully.

speaker: REYES
line: I'll be right outside.

speaker: JEREMIAH SMITH
line: You're going to expose me. You're putting people in danger-- Abductees all over the country. I save them. I'm the only one.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Where's Mulder?

speaker: JEREMIAH SMITH
line: You came crashing in here. I was trying to help him, too.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Where is Mulder?

speaker: SKINNER
line: You'd better come with us.

speaker: ABSALOM
line: You must protect me.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What is it?

speaker: SKINNER
line: It's Mulder.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Where is he?

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Agent Scully, he's over there.

speaker: SCULLY
line: How bad is he?

speaker: SCULLY
line: How bad is he?

speaker: SCULLY
line: How bad is he hurt?

speaker: SCULLY
line: No. No. No. No. He needs help.

speaker: DOGGETT
line: It's too late.

speaker: SCULLY
line: He needs help!

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Agent Scully.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Jeremiah.

speaker: SCULLY
line: No... no. This is not happening!

speaker: SCULLY
line: No!
